description:
In this course, you will learn how to bend balloons into various animals and objects.

It starts with simple models and makes it's way to more advanced balloons.

You will learn to bend the following:

  • The different types of twists
  • Learn to make 2 types of dogs
  • Learn to make 2 types of swords
  • Learn to make a butterfly
  • Learn to make a flower
  • Learn to make a lion
  • Learn to make a teddy bear

Bonus Videos:

  • How to make a snake
  • How to do a silly trick.
title: Balloon Bending
